member.name: T:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialogButton
member.summary: Common Task Dialog buttons. OK is the default button.

member.summary: Class that aggregates the results of an "indirect" Task Dialog.

member.summary: Results returned by Task Dialogs when closed by the user.

member.name: T:VistaControls.TaskDialog.CustomButton
member.summary: Represents a custom button shown on a Task Dialog.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.CustomButton.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiates a new custom button with an ID and a text.
member.param: Unique ID that will be returned by the Task Dialog if the button is clicked. Use values greater than 8 to prevent conflicts with common buttons.
Text label shown on the button. If you enable Command Links, a newline here separates the upper from the lower string on the button.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.CustomButton.#ctor(VistaControls.TaskDialog.Result,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiates a new custom button with an ID and a text.
member.param: Common ID that will be returned by the Task Dialog if the button is clicked.
Text label shown on the button. If you enable Command Links, a newline here separates the upper from the lower string on the button.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.CustomButton.Id
member.summary: Unique ID that will be returned by the Task Dialog if the button is clicked.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.CustomButton.Text
member.summary: Text label shown on the button. If you enable Command Links, a newline here separates the upper from the lower string on the button.

member.name: T:VistaControls.ThemeText.ThemedLabel
member.summary: A Label containing some text that will be drawn with glowing border on top of the Glass Sheet effect.

member.summary: Size of the glow effect around the text.

member.summary: Enables or disables the glow effect around the text.

member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical text alignment setting.

member.name: P:VistaControls.ThemeText.ThemedLabel.SingleLine
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the text will be laid out on a single line or on multiple lines.

member.name: P:VistaControls.ThemeText.ThemedLabel.EndEllipsis
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the text lines over the label's border should be trimmed with an ellipsis.

member.name: P:VistaControls.ThemeText.ThemedLabel.WordBreak
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the text should break only at the end of a word.

member.name: P:VistaControls.ThemeText.ThemedLabel.WordEllipsis
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the text should be trimmed to the last word and an ellipse should be placed at the end of the line.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog
member.summary: Displays a dialog box that can contain text, icons, buttons, command links, radio buttons and/or a progress bar.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Show(System.String)
member.summary: Displays a task dialog that has a message.
member.param: The text to display.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Show(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Displays a task dialog that has a message and a title.
member.param: The text to display.
The title bar caption of the dialog.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Show(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Displays a task dialog that has a message, a title and an instruction.
member.param: The text to display.
The title bar caption of the dialog.
The instruction shown below the main text.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Show(System.String,System.String,System.String,VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialogButton)
member.summary: Displays a task dialog that has a message, a title, an instruction and one or more buttons.
member.param: The text to display.
The title bar caption of the dialog.
The instruction shown below the main text.
Value that specifies which button or buttons to display.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Show(System.String,System.String,System.String,VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialogButton,VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialogIcon)
member.summary: Displays a task dialog that has a message, a title, an instruction, one or more buttons and an icon.
member.param: The text to display.
The title bar caption of the dialog.
The instruction shown below the main text.
Value that specifies which button or buttons to display.
The icon to display.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new Task Dialog instance without text.

member.summary: Initializes a new Task Dialog instance with text.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new Task Dialog instance with an instruction and a title.

member.summary: Initializes a new Task Dialog instance with an instruction, a title and some content text.
member.param: The main instruction to display.
The title of the Task Dialog.
The content text that will be displayes below the main instruction.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialogButton)

member.param: The main instruction to display.
The title of the Task Dialog.
The content text that will be displayes below the main instruction.
Specifies one or more buttons to be displayed on the bottom of the dialog, instead of the default OK button.

The title of the Task Dialog.
The content text that will be displayes below the main instruction.
Specifies one or more buttons to be displayed on the bottom of the dialog, instead of the default OK button.
The icon to display.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.SimulateButtonClick(System.Int32)
member.summary: Injects a virtual button click.
member.param: Numeric id of the clicked button.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.SimulateRadioButtonClick(System.Int32)
member.summary: Injects a virtual radio button click.

member.summary: Injects a virtual checkbox click.

Sets whether the checkbox should have focus after state change.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.EnableButton(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables a button of the dialog.
member.param: Id of the button whose state will be changed.
New state of the button.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.EnableRadioButton(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables a radio button of the dialog.
member.param: Id of the radio button whose state will be changed.
New state of the button.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Navigate(VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog)
member.summary: Creates a new Task Dialog setup and replaces the existing one. Note that the window will not be destroyed and that you should keep the existing TaskDialog reference (event handlers will still be registered). The existing Task Dialog will simply reset and use the options of the new one.
member.param: An instance of Task Dialog, whose settings will be copied into the existing dialog. You may safely destroy the nextDialog instance after use (do not register to events on it).

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.SetShieldButton(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds or removes an UAC Shield icon from a button.
member.param: Id of the button.
Sets whether to display a Shield icon or not.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.SetMarqueeProgressBar(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets whether the dialog's progress bar should be in standard or in marquee mode.
member.param: True if the progress bar should be displayed in marquee mode (no explicit progress).

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.SetMarqueeProgressBar(System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets whether the dialog's progress bar should be in standard or in marquee mode and sets its marquee speed.
member.param: True if the progress bar should be displayed in marquee mode (no explicit progress).
Speed of the progress bar in marquee mode.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.CommonCallbackProc(System.IntPtr,System.UInt32,System.UIntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Common native callback for Task Dialogs. Will route events to the user event handler.
member.param: TODO: Currently unused, would need complex marshaling of data.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.PreConfig(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Prepares the internal configuration structure.
member.remarks: Allocates some unmanaged memory, must always be followed by a PostConfig() call.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.PostConfig
member.summary: Frees the unmanages memory allocated by PreConfig().

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Show
member.summary: Displays the task dialog without an explicit parent.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Show(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Displays the task dialog with an explicit parent window.
member.param: Handle to the dialog's parent window.

member.name: M:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Show(System.Windows.Forms.Form)
member.summary: Displays the task dialog with an explicit parent form.
member.param: Instance of the dialog's parent form.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.IsShowing
member.summary: Is true if the task dialog is currently displayed.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the dialog.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.CommonIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon of the dialog, from a set of common icons.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.CustomIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon of the dialog, from a custom Icon instance.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.CommonButtons
member.summary: Gets or sets the dialog's buttons, from one or more common button types.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.CustomButtons
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of custom buttons which will be displayed on the dialog.
member.remarks: These buttons can also be shown as Command Links optionally.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.DefaultButton
member.summary: Gets or sets the integer identificator of the dialog's default button.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.RadioButtons
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of custom buttons which will be displayed as radio buttons.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.EnabledRadioButton
member.summary: Gets or sets the identificator of the enabled radio button by default.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.VerificationText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that will be shown next to a verification checkbox.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.ExpandedControlText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed on the control that enables the user to expand and collapse the dialog, when the dialog is in expanded mode.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.CollapsedControlText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed on the control that enables the user to expand and collapse the dialog, when the dialog is in collapsed mode.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.FooterCommonIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon shown in the dialog's footer, from a set of common icons.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.FooterCustomIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon shown in the dialog's footer, from a custom Icon instance.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Width
member.summary: Explicitly sets the desiderd width in pixels of the dialog.
member.remarks: Will be set automatically by the task dialog to an optimal size.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Instruction
member.summary: Gets or Sets the Main Instruction text of the TaskDialog.
member.remarks: Text written in blue and slightly bigger font in Windows Aero.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the Content text of the TaskDialog.
member.remarks: Text written with standard font, right below the Main instruction.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.ExpandedInformation
member.summary: Gets or Sets the expanded information text, that will be optionally shown by clicking on the Expand control.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Footer
member.summary: Gets or Sets the Footer text.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.ProgressBarPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the current Progress bar value.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.ProgressBarMinRange
member.summary: Gets of sets the minimum value allowed by the Progress bar.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.ProgressBarMaxRange
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value allowed by the Progress bar.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.ProgressBarState
member.summary: Gets or sets the current Progress bar state.
member.remarks: Determines the bar's color and behavior.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.EnableHyperlinks
member.summary: Enables or disables Hyperlinks in the content (in the form of <A HREF="link">).

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.AllowDialogCancellation
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the dialog can be cancelled (ESC, ALT+F4 and X button) even if no Cancel button has been specified.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.UseCommandLinks
member.summary: Gets or sets whether Command Link buttons should be used instead of standard custom buttons (doesn't apply to custom buttons, like OK or Cancel).

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.UseCommandLinksWithoutIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets whether Command Link buttons wihtout icon should be used instead of standard custom buttons (doesn't apply to custom buttons, like OK or Cancel).

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.ShowExpandedInfoInFooter
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the ExpandedInformation should be shown in the Footer area (instead of under the Content text).

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.IsExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the ExpandedInformation is visible on dialog creation.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.IsVerificationChecked
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the Verification checkbox should be checked when the dialog is shown.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.ShowProgressBar
member.summary: Gets or sets whether a progress bar should be displayed on the dialog.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.EnableCallbackTimer
member.summary: Sets or gets whether the user specified callback (if any) should be called every 200ms.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.PositionRelativeToWindow
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the dialog should be positioned centered on the parent window.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.RightToLeftLayout
member.summary: Enables or disables right to left reading order.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.NoDefaultRadioButton
member.summary: Gets or sets whether there should be a selected radio button by default when the dialog is shown.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.CanBeMinimized
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the dialog may be minimized or not.

member.name: E:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Created
member.summary: Occurs when the Task Dialog is first created and before it is displayed (is sent after Construction event).

member.name: E:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.ButtonClick
member.summary: Occurs when the user clicks a button or a command link. By default the Dialog is closed after the notification.

member.name: E:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.HyperlinkClick
member.summary: Occurs when the user clicks on a Hyperlink in the Content text.

member.name: E:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Navigating
member.summary: Occurs when a navigation event is raised.

member.name: E:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Tick
member.summary: Occurs approximately every 200ms if the Task Dialog callback timer is enabled.

member.name: E:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Destroyed
member.summary: Occurs when the Task Dialog is destroyed and the handle to the dialog is not valid anymore.

member.name: E:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.RadioButtonClick
member.summary: Occurs when the user selects a radio button.

member.name: E:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Constructed
member.summary: Occurs when the Task Dialog is constructed and before it is displayed (is sent before Creation event).

member.name: E:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.VerificationClick
member.summary: Occurs when the user switches the state of the Verification Checkbox.

member.name: E:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Help
member.summary: Occurs when the user presses F1 when the Task Dialog has focus.

member.name: E:VistaControls.TaskDialog.TaskDialog.Expanding
member.summary: Occurs when the user clicks on the expand button of the dialog, before the dialog is expanded.

member.name: T:VistaControls.Dwm.Thumbnail
member.summary: Handle to a DWM Thumbnail.

member.name: M:VistaControls.Dwm.Thumbnail.Update(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Byte,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the thumbnail's display settings.
member.param: Drawing region on destination window.
Origin region from source window.
Opacity. 0 is transparent, 255 opaque.
Visibility flag.
If true, only the client area of the window will be rendered. Otherwise, the borders will be be rendered as well.

member.name: M:VistaControls.Dwm.Thumbnail.Update(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Byte,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the thumbnail's display settings.
member.param: Drawing region on destination window.
Opacity. 0 is transparent, 255 opaque.
Visibility flag.
If true, only the client area of the window will be rendered. Otherwise, the borders will be be rendered as well.

member.name: P:VistaControls.Dwm.Thumbnail.IsInvalid
member.summary: Returns true if the handle is valid, false if the handle has been closed or hasn't been initialized.

member.name: P:VistaControls.Dwm.Thumbnail.Opacity
member.summary: Sets the thumbnail opacity value, from 0 to 255 (opaque).

member.name: P:VistaControls.Dwm.Thumbnail.ShowOnlyClientArea
member.summary: Sets whether only the client area of the thumbnailed window should be shown or the entire window area.

member.name: P:VistaControls.Dwm.Thumbnail.DestinationRectangle
member.summary: Area in the destination window on which the thumbnail should be drawn.

member.name: P:VistaControls.Dwm.Thumbnail.SourceRectangle
member.summary: Region of the source window that should be drawn.

member.name: P:VistaControls.Dwm.Thumbnail.Visible
member.summary: Sets whether the thumbnail should be drawn or not.

member.name: P:VistaControls.Dwm.Thumbnail.SourceSize
member.summary: Gets the thumbnail's original size.

member.name: T:VistaControls.SearchTextBox
member.summary: A standard WinForms text box presenting the common Vista "search" interface. Reacts on user input by raising "SearchStarted" events.

member.name: M:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: M:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.SetFocusWithoutSelection
member.summary: Puts the focus on the text box and moves the caret to the end of the text, without selecting it.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.HoverButtonColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background Color of the button when the mouse hovers on it.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.ActiveForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the ForeColor of the control when the search box is active.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.ActiveBackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the BackColor of the control when the search box is active.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.InactiveForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the ForeColor of the control when the search box is inactive.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.InactiveBackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the BackColor of the control when the search box is inactive.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.ForeColor
member.summary: Temporary ForeColor property of the control. You should use InactiveForeColor and ActiveForeColor instead.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.BackColor
member.summary: Temporary BackColor property of the control. You should use InactiveBackColor and ActiveBackColor instead.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.InactiveText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that is shown on top of the text box when the user hasn't entered any text.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.ActiveFont
member.summary: Gets or sets the font used in the search text box.
member.remarks: Equals to the Font property.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.InactiveFont
member.summary: Gets or sets the font used to write the "inactivity label" on top of the control when the user hasn't entered any text.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.Font
member.summary: Overall Font property of the control. Property changes are forwarded to the ActiveFont property.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SearchTextBox.TextEntered
member.summary: Returns true if the user entered some text in the search textbox.

member.name: T:VistaControls.OsSupport
member.summary: Static class providing information about the current support for Vista-only features.

member.name: P:VistaControls.OsSupport.IsVistaOrBetter
member.summary: Is true if the running operating system is Windows Vista or a more recent version.

member.name: P:VistaControls.OsSupport.IsCompositionEnabled
member.summary: Is true if the DWM composition engine is currently enabled.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TextBox.CueBannerText
member.summary: Gets or sets the cue text that is displayed on the TextBox control.

member.name: P:VistaControls.TextBox.ShowCueFocused
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the Cue text should be displyed even when the control has keybord focus.
member.remarks: If true, the Cue text will disappear as soon as the user starts typing.

member.name: P:VistaControls.Dwm.Helpers.GlassForm.GlassMargins
member.summary: Gets or sets the glass margins of the form.

member.name: P:VistaControls.Dwm.Helpers.GlassForm.HandleMouseMove
member.summary: Gets or sets whether mouse dragging should be handled automatically.

member.name: P:VistaControls.Dwm.Helpers.GlassForm.GlassEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the extended glass margin is enabled or not.

member.name: T:VistaControls.Dwm.DwmManager
member.summary: Main DWM class, provides Thumbnail registration, glass sheet effect and blur behind.

member.name: M:VistaControls.Dwm.DwmManager.Register(System.Windows.Forms.Form,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Registers a thumbnail to be drawn on a Windows Form.
member.remarks: The thumbnail will not be drawn until you update the thumbnail's properties calling Update().
member.param: The Windows Form instance on which to draw the thumbnail.
The handle (HWND) of the window that has to be drawn.
member.returns: A Thumbnail instance, needed to unregister and to update properties.

member.name: M:VistaControls.Dwm.DwmManager.Register(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Registers a thumbnail to be drawn on a window.
member.remarks: The thumbnail will not be drawn until you update the thumbnail's properties calling Update().
member.param: The handle (HWND) of the window on which the thumbnail will be drawn.
The handle (HWND) of the window that has to be drawn.
member.returns: A Thumbnail instance, needed to unregister and to update properties.

member.name: M:VistaControls.Dwm.DwmManager.Unregister(VistaControls.Dwm.Thumbnail)
member.summary: Unregisters the thumbnail handle.
member.remarks: The handle is unvalid after the call and should not be used again.
member.param: A handle to a registered thumbnail.

member.name: M:VistaControls.Dwm.DwmManager.EnableBlurBehind(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Enable the Aero "Blur Behind" effect on the whole client area. Background must be black.

member.summary: Disables the Aero "Blur Behind" effect.

member.name: M:VistaControls.Dwm.GlassHelper.HandleFormMovementOnGlass(System.Windows.Forms.Form,VistaControls.Dwm.Margins)
member.summary: Adds a handler on the Form that enables the user to move the window around by clicking on a glass margin (or the title bar, as usual).
member.param: The form that will be controlled.
Margins of the glass sheet.
member.remarks: Eventual UI elements on the glass sheet will prevent the handler from receiving events (except the ThemeText control, which manually redirects mouse events to the form)

member.name: M:VistaControls.Dwm.GlassHelper.HandleBackgroundPainting(System.Windows.Forms.Form,VistaControls.Dwm.Margins)
member.summary: Adds a handler on the Form that automatically paints the glass background black
member.param: The form that will be controlled.
Margins of the glass sheet.

member.name: T:VistaControls.Dwm.GlassHelper.HandleFormMovement
member.remarks: Handler will be kept alive by the event references on the form. As soon as the form is disposed, the handler will be disposed as well.

member.name: T:VistaControls.Dwm.GlassHelper.HandleBackground
member.remarks: Handler will be kept alive by the event references on the form. As soon as the form is disposed, the handler will be disposed as well.

member.name: E:VistaControls.SplitButton.SplitClick
member.summary: Occurs when the split label is clicked.

member.name: E:VistaControls.SplitButton.SplitMenuOpening
member.summary: Occurs when the split label is clicked, but before the associated context menu is displayed by the control.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SplitButton.SplitMenuStrip
member.summary: Gets or sets the associated context menu that is displayed when the split glyph of the button is clicked.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SplitButton.SplitMenu
member.summary: Gets or sets the associated context menu that is displayed when the split glyph of the button is clicked. Exposed for backward compatibility.

member.name: T:VistaControls.SplitButton.SplitMenuEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the clicking of split buttons and the opening of context menus.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SplitButton.SplitMenuEventArgs.DrawArea
member.summary: Represents the bounding box of the clicked button.
member.remarks: A menu should be opened, with top-left coordinates in the left-bottom point of the rectangle and with width equal (or greater) than the width of the rectangle.

member.name: P:VistaControls.SplitButton.SplitMenuEventArgs.PreventOpening
member.summary: Set to true if you want to prevent the menu from opening.

member.name: T:VistaControls.Dwm.Margins
member.summary: Margins structure for the Glass Sheet effect.

member.name: M:VistaControls.Dwm.ThumbnailViewer.SetThumbnail(System.Windows.Forms.Form,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the origin of the thumbnail and shows the thumbnail on the control.
member.param: The Form instance that will be thumbnailed.
True if the control should automatically update itself in case the thumbnailed form changes size or is closed.

member.name: M:VistaControls.Dwm.ThumbnailViewer.Update
member.summary: Forces and update of the thumbnail.
member.remarks: Use this method if you know that the thumbnailed window has been resized and the thumbnail control should react to these changes.
